description: The snowdrop windflower (Anemone sylvestris) is an amazing plant species that is versatile and easy to grow in a variety of climates. This low-growing perennial has late spring flowers in gorgeous shades of white, blue and pink, often divided into a 3-petal star shape. Its delicate foliage appears in textured hues of green and gray. The flowers are stunning in cut-flower arrangements, and the plant can be used in borders to add vertical interest. It is also a great choice for rock gardens and is known to be highly tolerant of drought and cold temperatures. This hardy and reliable plant is perfect for anyone looking to add a little beauty to their garden.
